Your gills and skin are highly permeable to moisture, and you can hydrate your body through osmosis.  While submerged in fresh water, any thirst you might have will be slaked.

A network of jelly-filled electroreceptors, like that of a shark, have grown throughout your face and nose.  They are very sensitive to magnetic fields, allowing you to see robots and creatures charged with electricity through walls, but being shocked will seriously mess you up.

Your teeth have grown incredibly sharp, and have calcified even further.  In addition to letting you eat much faster, you can use them as a lethal natural weapon, as long as your anatomy favors it.  They also grow very fast, and you harmlessly shed them more or less at random.

attacks.attack_text_u: You tear into %s with your teeth!

description: You are a duly sworn law enforcement officer, with jurisdiction throughout the New England region thanks to interstate agreements.  Whether that means anything now is another question.
You are a duly sworn law enforcement officer, with jurisdiction throughout the New England region thanks to interstate agreements.  Whether that means anything now is another question.
Thou art a lewede man, a lowly cowherd, though where thi catel been thou hast not ynn certain.
You are a duly sworn law enforcement investigator, with jurisdiction throughout the New England region thanks to interstate agreements.  Whether your shield means anything now is another question.
You are a duly sworn Federal marshal, with nationwide jurisdiction and the authority of the United States of America.
You are known to be a capable and resourceful mercenary at the employ of Hub 01.

You are the true Foodperson, some might think Foodperson is just a mascot, but you know better.  You are Foodperson, the mask has become your face; you are real, and the only thing standing between this world and oblivion is you.

//: In the US, a medical 'residency' is essentially an extended post-graduate, on-the-job medical training.  The idea here is that hospital computer systems would recognize the PC as a valid user and grant access.
description: You were just through with the administrative formalities for your residency when the Cataclysm struck.  "Your" hospital was overrun and evacuated, but there's always work for a good doctor.
You are skilled in maneuvering on skates.  You suffer lower penalties to dodging and are less likely to fall down if hit in melee combat while you're wearing rollerskates or rollerblades.
You were shaping up to be a pretty decent student of the martial arts before the Cataclysm struck.  Time to see just how good you really are.
You were competitive at national levels, and had considered teaching your art.  Defending against the entire town may still be a challenge, though.
You are experienced in the Sweet Science of boxing.  You could've had a shot at a local boxing tournament, if the Cataclysm hadn't screwed that up.
You have some training in the art of kickboxing.  It's just boxing with kicks, right?
You're trained in proper operation of the Autodoc, an advanced machine used for surgical procedures.  Operations involving it will be moderately more likely to succeed.

Weeks spent picking through manuals and researching topics you aren't versed in has taught you to find what you need to know more quickly.  You read slightly faster, and suffer no reading time penalty for books too complex for you to easily understand.
This Bartender now carries brandy!
This Bartender now carries rum!
This Bartender now carries whiskey!
New mission options have become available!
New options may have become available!
New options may have become available!
Marker for starting NPCs
Marker for static NPCs
NPC trait that makes them be hallucination.  It is a bug if you have it.
NPC ignores sounds and does not investigate them.  If you see this, it's is a bug.
NPC will not bash to reach things.  If you see this, it's a bug.
NPC will return to its spawn position on idle.
This is an AI tag to give a static NPC a random mission.  If you see this, it's a bug.
This is an AI tag to give a static NPC a random mission that doesn't involve them following you.  If you see this, it's a bug.
Gain a tail bodypart.
They said college costs an arm and a leg, they sure weren't kidding!
They said college what make me smart, this is a lot to lug around!
You can clearly see that this is for dev purposes only.
You can clearly see that this is for dev purposes only.
You can see all the bugs with this one.
If you see this, you'd best be debugging something.
Holds hunger, thirst, and fatigue stable.  You can debug all year long with this one!
You can run, but you'll never run out of breath.
If you need to survive the deadliest bug attacks.
Heal yourself from this stupid bug attacks.
Smell that bug?  Smell's certainly not coming from you!
Be vewwy vewwy quiet.  We're hunting bugs.

//: Moved to mainline so multiple mods have access to this debug trait.
description: To cast bug killing spells.  Also increase the cast speed of spells.
Temperature and weather won't bug you.
Bug-repellent forcefield.
You start to emit a light, so you can debug in the darkest nights.
Crafting and construction requirements bugger off with this one.  Apply with care.
Crafting failures won't bug you any more.
Craft the bug out 50 times faster.
Mind the bugs, would you kindly?
Lets you instantly install torsion ratchets for your eight legs.
With this, you'll be fixing those bugs faster than ever!
You are prevented from death.
You can't even think about putting filthy clothes on yourself, especially from zombies' corpses.
NPC trait that makes monsters see it as a bee.  It is a bug (heh) if you have it.
NPC trait that makes fungaloid monsters see this NPC as a friend.
Trait that makes it impossible to say anything.
You're too adventurous for your own good.  The more time you spend somewhere, the unhappier it makes you to be there.
You can't bear to stay still for long.  Your morale will suffer unless you constantly explore new territory.
Spending any amount of time in familiar places makes you miserable.  Must.  Keep.  Moving.
Whether from personal choice or childhood trauma, traveling with vehicles is off-limits to you, even if your life depended on it.
Whether from personal choice or childhood trauma, using ranged weapons is off-limits to you, even if your life depended on it.
You have fast reflexes, allowing you to dodge attacks more easily.
You really want to eat some carrots.  Welcome to the Lagomorpha family.
Your ears have grown into tall and flexible rabbit ears.  They're are slender and enhance your hearing beyond the normal range.
Your stubby tail has become fuzzy and more round, but doesn't seem to serve any purpose.
Your fur keeps you covered in winter, maintaining heat and allowing you to better tolerate cold temperatures.

Your feet have grown into strong and large rabbit feet.  This makes your kicks pack a little more oomph.  Emphasis on little.  It also offers some warmth, and the lucky part is but superstition.  The downside is you are unable to wear shoes.

attacks.attack_text_u: You kick %s with your large feet!

description: Your nose has morphed into a cute bunny nose, along with the snout.  It's extremely twitchy too.

Your hands have elongated and look a bit more like paws.  It makes fine manipulation a little more difficult, but you can still probably manage.  Plus, they allow you to move on all fours when crouching and unarmed.

msg_on.text: You drop down on all fours.

msg_off.text: You rise up to walk on your hind feet.

description: Since the start of the Cataclysm, something has been hunting you relentlessly.  You can outrun it, but it always seems to find you eventually.  The only escape is for one of you to die.
Your ability to feel or express emotion has been greatly hampered.
You know how to project your voice.  You are able to shout much louder than the average person.
Your muscles, joints, and the movement center of your brain have changed internally somewhat, allowing you to traverse obstacles with ease.
You really hate getting your fur all wet.  This increases morale penalties for being wet, and you will get them even when wearing appropriate clothing.
Fake mutation to allow post-threshold Ursine mutants access to mutations normally gated behind Carnivore.  This is not meant to be visible in-game.

//: Like Resilient, but Medical-flavored, and doesn't need huge/strong
description: Your body is well-adapted to resist trauma.  20% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.

//: Like Solidly Built, but Medical-flavored, and doesn't need huge/strong
description: Your body is extremely well-adapted to resist trauma.  30% bonus to all hit points.  Stacks with Tough, etc.
You shouldn't see this.  This makes you spawn tainted shadows.
You are terribly afraid of the dark.  You refuse to enter very dark areas.  If you somehow still happen to stay in dark areas, you suffer from various detrimental mental and physical effects.

You fare better than most in colder climates and are less bothered by lower temperatures.  Note that while you are slightly less prone to developing frostbite as a result, you aren't any better at dealing with the symptoms.
You are now even less bothered by the cold and it is harder for you to freeze or to even get chilly.  When you do though, it'll hit just as hard as it did before.

You fare better than most in warmer climates and are less bothered by hotter temperatures.  Note that while you it will take more heat and exposure for you to suffer from sunstroke, this will not make dealing with its consequences any easier.
You are now even less bothered by the heat and it is harder for you to overheat or even sweat.  When you do though, it'll hit just as hard as it did before.
Your skin is covered in shifting patterns of dots, lines, and swirls.  This is outside of your control and does not help your stealth.  In fact, it makes you more noticeable.
Your can change your skin patterns to match your environment, somewhat increasing your stealthiness.

Your mind has been altered in such a way that you now find it very difficult to understand humans.  Your capability to persuade and lie to them suffers slightly, even if it is mitigated by your intelligence.  In addition, while you find it much easier to learn by doing now, the plasticity of your psyche means you forget skills much faster.
You are now not at all bothered by the heat and it is harder for you to overheat or freeze at all.  When you do though, it'll hit just as hard as it did before.
You know you're beautiful, and the world deserves to know it too.  You prefer to show off your stunningly good looks to the world and will be unhappy if you cover up your face.
You're a very picky eater.  You refuse to eat any food that tastes bad unless you're starving.
You can't stand to prostrate yourself before your lessers and hate it when they don't immediately do what you say.  Persuasion is much more difficult, but you're better at lying and intimidating.

You can hear your heartbeat in your ears, feel the blood sloshing around in your veins.  The uneven hitches in your breath, the aches in your joints, the rumbling of your stomach.  It's nasty and messy and ugly.  And you are extremely grateful for that.
While it doesn't cause you any problems in daily life, your immune system and body chemistry are overly sensitive to foreign implants.  You cannot have any CBMs installed.
